post.text: Our jobs have been destroyed! I am about creating JOBS and nobody can do it like me. #MakeAmericaWorkAgain

comment.author: Christopher
comment.text: What's silly is Democrats are attacking some similarities between Michelle Obama's speech and a speech Trump's wife gave yet they are not concerned about Hillary's secret speeches.. She received $225,000 giving a speech to Goldman Sachs, Clinton also made 8 speeches to big banks, netting $1.8 million, according to a CNN analysis. Aren't those the speeches we should all be analyzing!?.

replies.author: Jonathon
replies.text: They were not public engagements which means who ever hired her owns the speech./work. Gosh you have to explain every little thing to his supporters.

replies.author: Christopher
replies.text: Just like Loretta Lynch's meeting with Bill Clinton wasn't for the public to see.. Sketchy

replies.author: Dominic
replies.text: Jonathon Explain the APA rule of common phrases ...Einstein It is also from the movie John Q. (2002) Which was adapted from a Jimmy Stewart movie. Your bond is your word is from Melvyn Douglas
